data.title: How Much Are Eyelash Extensions - Around The World?
data.meta_description: How Much Are Eyelash Extensions - Around The World? How much do eyelash extensions cost. A list of lash studios from all over the world with main lash services and prices. Getting the lashes done is not cheap pleasure - and with a good reason: each and every successful lashing procedure is a piece of art.
data.text:
How much do eyelash extensions cost in different counties of the world? Getting the lashes done is not cheap pleasure - and with a good reason: each and every successful lashing procedure is a piece of art, which is performed by an artist with skills, passion, and professionalism. Add a set of high-quality materials and tools.

Prices vary depending on the location and the market position of each lashing studio - in some countries, all kinds of services are expensive, while in others cheap. Some studios aim for high-end paying customers, others want to be available for people with average income.

We have put together a little overview with several pricing examples around the world, some of the studios in our list are current users of BL Lashes.

BL Lashes itself is a South Korean company, based in Seoul, and proud of serving lash studios and retailers in over 70 countries. We love to see how different salons get by and serve their customers.

Additional reading: Who Is Your Lash Studio's Ideal Customer?

Surprising lash studio's search results

We have to admit that finding prices was not as easy at all. It was a big, sad surprise. Unfortunately, many searches lead to Instagram or Facebook pages that had no further information, or to homepages that lacked price lists and an overview of services.

There are some major cities that have many beautiful and great websites (competition is a good thing!), and other places where finding a decent price list was mission impossible (a wonderful opportunity to any lash salon to do it better and be ranking high quick!).

So check your own website: how does it look? Are all of your services listed in a logical system? Are all your prices visible (most searches will never call for a reservation if they donâ€™t even know your pricing level)?

Next, check out your local competitors - how are their websites? Can potential customers find all the information they need? Learn from great websites and update yours.

Also, remember that people are traveling these days like never before, so make sure that you have your information also in English, even if on a few separate pages only, it is still findable on Google and a big help.

Lash salons from different parts of the world

The prices listed below are mostly starting from prices in the particular lash studios and do not represent every location of the country. It is obvious that prices are much higher in metropoles and downtowns, and lower in rural towns and suburbs. But we did try to bring out prices that fall more or less into the average level.

Our overview is meant to be a fun guide that lets you travel around the world and feel the spirit of different parts of the globe.

All local prices have been converted into USD.

Get your lash studio featured!

Would you like to have your own lash salon featured on our list?

Feel free to send us the address of your homepage and please make sure that you have all your services with prices listed on it. It will bring us all much pleasure to see more businesses worldwide and, when possible, to drop by and say hi!

Learn more about lash extension industry here:

Will the Eyelash Extension Market Continue to Grow?
